channel.title: Counter strike 1.6 map downloas on a real server?
channel.description: Well can any one give me a link where it gives you a tut on how to install maps on a cs1.6 server not dedicated? Thanks im trying to get surf_ski_2 i have the file downloaded but i just don't no where to put it and I tried googling.

item.title: Counter strike 1.6 map downloas on a real server?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:19, topic:177931”][quote author=mrrules link=topic=238878.msg2035940#msg2035940 date=1202346042]

source is $20 alone; and cs 1.6 blows big fat hairy cock compared to source.

Trying play leagues… Way better then source…

Hitbox is so fucked up in source its not even funny.

I can awp someone and HS and be a inch from aiming at there head. Sorry but source is for nubz.

And RXL (what ever it is , too lazy to lookup) you haven’t even played real source m8. Your gonna like better when you play with real people.

source is $20 alone; and cs 1.6 blows big fat hairy cock compared to source.

You’re insane. 1.6 is just as good as Source if not better.

Way better more class. I’d rather play 1.5 then source.

Agree. I use to play 1.5 back in the days
[/quote]Cool but mr.rules it still dosent work? I got the RES, BSP, and TXT file in there too…[/quote]
Hey man if you still need help add me to aim or msn and ill walk out thru it.

AIM: skatetopia2006@aol.com

MSN: gamemaster_36@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.source: Counter strike 1.6 map downloas on a real server?

item.title: Counter strike 1.6 map downloas on a real server?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

First delete the surf_ski_2 maps you have now and place this in there.

Location Path: C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\account name\counter-strike\cstrike\maps

Map Download Link: http://rapidshare.com/files/89171471/maps.rar.html

Just place those in there , and if that doesn’t work try reinstalling then placing the maps in there. If that doesn’t work it’s just the server.

Read full topic
